description: This table stores mappings from the Epic-defined race values to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) defined race values as specified in the OMB Race Mapping Configuration of system definitions.

columns.name: FAC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the facility record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OMB_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Office of Management and Budget (OMB) race category ID for the OMB Race Mapping Configuration in system definitions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


White


Black or African American


American Indian and Alaska Native


Asian


Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander


Some Other Race


Two or More Races


Asked but No Answer


Unknown
